resources.string: Max will be designing and coming up with interesting ways to do things.
Sage has setup Amazon web services and installed apache, php, mysql. He will be doing android development, webservices, and database design
Rahman is going to be developing for android and working with Sage on the Database Structure
Mike is chilling in Hawaii sending us store via the Internet! Maybe doing hangouts for todays class. He will probably handling a lot of the back end of the website.
